short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides shared content, comment replies, and sponsored posts on Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anti-Share for Facebook Hides shared content, comment replies, and sponsored posts on Facebook.
Enjoy Facebook free of annoying shared content so you can get back to seeing what your friends are actually up to.

The type of content that is hidden from your Facebook wall can be configured in the Options menu.
